00034         struct EmptyClass: public Writable, public Readable {
00035             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00036                 w->startWriting("EmptyClass");
00037                 w->doneWriting();
00038             }
00039             
00040             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00041                 r->startReading("EmptyClass");
00042                 r->doneReading();
00043             }
00044         };
00045     
00046         struct IntWrapper: public Writable, public Readable {
00047             int i;
00048             IntWrapper(int i):i(i){}
00049             IntWrapper():i(-3){}
00050             
00051             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00052                 w->startWriting("IntWrapper");
00053                     w->write_i32(i, "i");
00054                 w->doneWriting();
00055             }
00056             
00057             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00058                 r->startReading("IntWrapper");
00059                     i = r->read_i32("i");
00060                 r->doneReading();
00061             }
00062         };

00064         struct Complex1: public Writable, public Readable {
00065             EmptyClass s;
00066             Complex1() {}
00067             
00068             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00069                 w->startWriting("Complex");
00070                     w->writeObject(false, &s, "s");
00071                 w->doneWriting();
00072             }
00073             
00074             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00075                 r->startReading("Complex");
00076                     r->readObject( &s, "s");
00077                 r->doneReading();
00078             }
00079         };

00175         struct Complex3: public Writable, public Readable {
00176             IntWrapper a,b; EmptyClass s;
00177             Complex3(int a=-1,int b=-1):a(a),b(b) {}
00178             
00179             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00180                 w->startWriting("Complex3");
00181                     w->writeObject(false, &a, "a");
00182                     w->writeObject(false,  &b, "b");
00183                     w->writeObject(false, &s, "s");
00184                 w->doneWriting();
00185             }
00186             
00187             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00188                 r->startReading("Complex3");
00189                     r->readObject( &a, "a");
00190                     r->readObject( &b, "b");
00191                     r->readObject( &s, "s");
00192                 r->doneReading();
00193             }
00194         };

00196         struct String1: public Writable, public Readable {
00197             std::string s;
00198             String1(cstr s = "") : s(s) { }
00199 
00200             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00201                 w->startWriting("String1");
00202                     w->writeString(s, "myString");
00203                 w->doneWriting();
00204             }
00205 
00206             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00207                 r->startReading("String1");
00208                     s = r->readString("myString");
00209                 r->doneReading();
00210             }
00211         };

00213         #define DATA1_BUFFER_SIZE 512
00214         struct Data1: public Writable, public Readable {
00215             char* buffer;
00216             Data1() {
00217                 buffer = new char[DATA1_BUFFER_SIZE];
00218                 for (int i = 0; i < DATA1_BUFFER_SIZE; i++) buffer[i] = i % 100;
00219             }
00220 
00221             ~Data1() { delete[] buffer; }
00222 
00223             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00224                 w->startWriting("Data1");
00225                     w->writeBytes(buffer, DATA1_BUFFER_SIZE, "bytes");
00226                 w->doneWriting();
00227             }
00228 
00229             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00230                 r->startReading("Data1");
00231                     size_t n;
00232                     r->readBytes((void**) &buffer, &n, "bytes");
00233                 r->doneReading();
00234             }
00235         };
00236 
00237         struct StringAndData1: public Writable, public Readable {
00238             String1 s1;
00239             Data1 d1;
00240             StringAndData1(cstr s = "") : s1(s) { }
00241 
00242             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00243                 w->startWriting("StringAndData1");
00244                     w->writeObject(false, &s1, "TheString");
00245                     w->writeObject(true, &d1, "TheData");
00246                 w->doneWriting();
00247             }
00248 
00249             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00250                 r->startReading("StringAndData1");
00251                     r->readObject(&s1, "TheString");
00252                     r->readObject(&d1, "TheData");
00253                 r->doneReading();
00254             }
00255         };

00257         #define ARRAY_SIZE 20
00258         struct ArrayUint8: public Writable, public Readable {
00259             uint8_t* a;
00260 
00261             ArrayUint8() {
00262                 a = new uint8_t[ARRAY_SIZE];
00263                 for (int i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE; i++) a[i] = i % 4;
00264             }
00265             ~ArrayUint8() { delete[] a; }
00266 
00267             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00268                 w->startWriting("ArrayUint8");
00269                     w->write_u8(a, ARRAY_SIZE, "theArray");
00270                 w->doneWriting();
00271             }
00272 
00273             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00274                 size_t sz;
00275                 delete[] a;
00276                 r->startReading("ArrayUint8");
00277                     r->read_u8(&a, &sz, "theArray");
00278                 r->doneReading();
00279             }
00280         };

00282         struct ArrayInt8: public Writable, public Readable {
00283             int8_t* a;
00284 
00285             ArrayInt8() {
00286                 a = new int8_t[ARRAY_SIZE];
00287                 for (int i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE; i++) a[i] = (i % 4 - 2) * 15;
00288             }
00289             ~ArrayInt8() { delete[] a; }
00290 
00291             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00292                 w->startWriting("ArrayInt8");

00294                 w->doneWriting();

00330         struct EmptyArray: public Writable, public Readable {
00331             int32_t* a; int n;
00332 
00333             EmptyArray() {
00334                 n = 0;
00335                 a = new int32_t[n];
00336             }
00337             ~EmptyArray() { delete[] a; }
00338 
00339             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00340                 w->startWriting("EmptyArray");
00341                     w->write_i32(a, n, "theArray");
00342                 w->doneWriting();
00343             }
00344 
00345             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00346                 size_t sz;
00347                 delete[] a;
00348                 r->startReading("EmptyArray");
00349                     r->read_i32(&a, &sz, "theArray");
00350                 r->doneReading();
00351             }
00352         };

00354         struct ArrayFloat32: public Writable, public Readable {
00355             float32_t* a;
00356 
00357             ArrayFloat32() {
00358                 a = new float32_t[ARRAY_SIZE];
00359                 for (int i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE; i++) a[i] = i / 3.;
00360             }
00361             ~ArrayFloat32() { delete[] a; }
00362 
00363             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00364                 w->startWriting("ArrayFloat32");
00365                     w->write_f32(a, ARRAY_SIZE, "theArray");
00366                 w->doneWriting();
00367             }
00368 
00369             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00370                 size_t sz;
00371                 delete[] a;
00372                 r->startReading("ArrayFloat32");
00373                     r->read_f32(&a, &sz, "theArray");
00374                 r->doneReading();

00377         
00378         struct VersionTest: public Writable, public Readable {
00379             unsigned char version;
00380 
00381             VersionTest() {
00382                 this->version = 42;
00383             }
00384 
00385             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00386                 w->startWriting("VersionTest", version);
00387                     w->write_i32(13);               
00388                 w->doneWriting();
00389             }
00390 
00391             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00392                 unsigned char version = r->startReading("VersionTest");
00393                 r->read_i32();
00394                 
00395                 r->doneReading();
00396                 if(version != this->version) {
00397                     throw ReadingException(string("Version number is different: wrote ")+toString((int)this->version)+
00398                         " but read "+toString((int)version));
00399                 }
00400             }
00401         };
00402         
00403         struct EmptyVersion: public Writable, public Readable {
00404 
00405             void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException) {
00406                 w->startWriting("EmptyVersion");
00407                 w->doneWriting();
00408             }
00409 
00410             void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00411                 unsigned char version = r->startReading("EmptyVersion");
00412                 r->doneReading();
00413                 
00414                 if(version != 1) {
00415                     throw ReadingException(string("Version number should be 1 instead of  ")+
00416                         toString((int)version));
00417                 }
00418             }
00419         };
